name: PS: Post Snake
description:
Originally made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 6!

Control your snake and weave your way in and around a little town while you deliver the mail to the people in these times of need. Time only passes when you move, so think ahead!

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • E to deliver mail to adjacent mailboxes if you have mail to deliver.
  • M to check the map.
  • F5 to retry at any moment.
  • Esc to pause.
